remarks: In a Moore system whose closure operator has the exchange property, if a set is independent and an element is not in its closure, then adding the element to the set gives another independent set.  Lemma 4.1.5 in [FaureFrolicher] p. 84.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
